Articles.Content:
Which nation is yours again?

Mine is Freedom
I'm low on oil from recent expansions on my airforce.
i try to send some fuel.
Can i join, my nations name is Alakambom
Welcome to the alliance.

Welcome to the crew Arrowhead119.

Im also going to help promote peace ,and space programs .

I'd love to join the alliance!

My nation name is 1941 Yankees

If you are still accepting members, you can add me, my id is ninja2late.

Edit*

Nation Name: Wadiya

Link: http://www.bloc.name/bloc/stats.php?id=627

Edited July 12, 2013 by ninja2late
Hey Ninja2Late, you need to post your nation name, not just your id. It'd help if you had a link to your country.
My nation needs assistance. War is tearing the economy apart. I need troops most importantly.

Nice browser based game...

Started yesterday, made a military dictatorship country.

Smuggling into the USA gave a nice boost money but I spent most prospecting for oil

I'm doing well, though... so far...

glad to anounce that my country the U.S.K is improving ,and buying lots of oil to meet demands ,and create growth.(I might be the one nation that is buying so much oil prices rises)

Just com me on bloc if you need some troops ,or some money.
I am the newly created nation of Heloin. I asume this will go badly for me.

just focus on increasing growth ,and watch out for the Goons ,and Facepunch alliance there are a very powerful alliance.

Edit:I would do something with that reputation as that can make nations attack you ,or if you get axis of evil well your pretty much screwed.

Sooo... I just found this and I created a country named "Imgur". So, can i join your alliance?

Edit: Oil Y U NO RAISE PRICE!

Edit2: Is thsi what im meant to be doing? So, first i want to raise my income, than increase living quality then military.

Edited July 15, 2013 by hotmailcompany52
How would one lower there reputation?

declaring war against a country with a green rep lowers your rep ,or doing actions like smuggling drugs to the US or blood diamonds.Raise it by doing humanitarian aid funding ,and building schools might work.

For Hotmailcompany you need to foucs first on your economy ,then start spending on schools that will improve quality of life ,and might generate some growth.then focus on your military it takes a few clicks on buying lee-enfields to get world war 1 surplus 40 for WWII.
Reminds me like Civ-V ish
Heloin and Imgur are invited.
Thanks, how do I make my GDP bigger?

Growth slowly increases you GDP if it goes negative your GDP goes down so it good to have lots of growth.

Edit: now I need to add two more nations to the list on our bloc alliance thread.
Hey all, my nation, 1941 Yankees, needs men badly. I'll pay $500k for 10k troops to anyone in the alliance with men to spare.
There 10k troops from the States why do you need them for anyways?

Thanks USK for the troops, I'll pay you 200k now, and 300k tomorrow morning.

USK is easily one of the best nations in our alliance, he's a real stand up guy.

BTW, my nation name is Populina.

Some guy declared war on me but he's getting owned by my military might! Haha!

I'm a dictator but somehow people really like me. (free housing, hospitals, schools but still, forced labor and such)

No rebel treat, calm stability and approval is liked!

If anyone know how to find oil post here please I need oil to fuel my airforce, tried prospecting but no success.
